title: EPISTOLA G.S. Harman
html:
EPISTOLA G.S. Harman

How curious that Bryan Garner should have listed the obscure Cantonese mui-tsai while omitting the well-known Suzie Wong.

[G.S. Harman, Hollywood, California]
